titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to limit the recognition of gain under section 355(e) of such Code to certain leveraged spin-merger transactions.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to limit the recognition of gain under section 355(e) of such Code to certain leveraged spin-merger transactions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to revise rules relating to the recognition of gain from distributions by corporations of stocks or securities in connection with certain leveraged transactions.
